body:
This small patch addresses external linkage issues sometimes encountered while building elfutils 0.185:
      https://bugs.gentoo.org/794601
      https://sourceware.org/pipermail/elfutils-devel/2021q2/003862.html

For myself, I see this failure while building elfutils within a Spack environment. Outside of a Spack environment, I don't have any issues. In the latter case, the presence of the patch does no harm.
title: elfutils: Address external linkage failures in 0.185
